thread.section_title: Fabletics Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Fabletics | fabletics.com | 32 of 588
thread.title: Jenn Richmond

author: Jenn Richmond
title: Jenn Richmond
text: Loving the whole experience of FABletics from signing up to receiving my order! The designs are innovative & unique, the fabric is top-notch quality and the variety of prints/solids/styles/separates is by far superior to other sites I order from. The quality and longevity of their products amaze me every time when I look at the price! What's most special is having somewhat of a personal shopper picking outfits for you monthly and guiding you to things maybe you wouldn't have normally considered. I really feel confident in the clothing and look like I'd fit in on the streets of L.A.!! I just wish I had more $$ to spend in my monthly budget because I'd happily re-do my wardrobe with nothing but fabulous FABletics!! Kate move over because I am absolutely, positively and definitely with NO doubt FABletics NEW #1 fan!!
